card.name: Absolver Thrull
card.property: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Absolver Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Belfry Spirit
card.property: Flying Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Belfry Spirit enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Benediction of Moons
card.property: You gain 1 life for each player. Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.) When the creature Benediction of Moons haunts dies, you gain 1 life for each player.

card.name: Droning Bureaucrats
card.property: {X}, {T}: Each creature with converted mana cost X can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: " . . . and you must also apply for an application license, file documents 136(iv) and 22-C and -D in triplicate, pay all requisite fees, request a . . ."

card.name: Ghost Warden
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I thought of fate as an iron lattice, intricate but rigidly unchangeable. That was until some force bent fate's bars to spare my life." —Ilromov, traveling storyteller

card.name: Ghostway
card.property: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl." —Klattic, Boros legionnaire

card.name: Graven Dominator
card.property: Flying Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Graven Dominator enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, each other creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

card.name: Guardian's Magemark
card.property: Flash Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The soldier moved with fluid poise, his awareness extending far beyond five senses.

card.name: Harrier Griffin
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moon Market merchants sell a bottled scent to cutpurses and other criminals. Those doused in the liquid become "griffin bait."

card.name: Leyline of the Meek
card.property: If Leyline of the Meek is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creature tokens get +1/+1.

card.name: Lionheart Maverick
card.property: Vigilance {4}{W}: Lionheart Maverick gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your signet is no symbol of power. It marks only your need for numbers to aid you. What do you do, guild-rat, now that you face my blade alone?"

card.name: Martyred Rusalka
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature can't attack this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists hanged her for sport in the township square. Her ghost now stands vigil at what has become known as the Tree of Weeping.

card.name: Order of the Stars
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) As Order of the Stars enters the battlefield, choose a color. Order of the Stars has protection from the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As stoic as the marble halls, as unblinking as the stars upon their shields.

card.name: Shadow Lance
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike. {1}{B}: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadow lances are crafted from harvested souls. The more wicked the sinner, the keener the blade.

card.name: Shrieking Grotesque
card.property: Flying When Shrieking Grotesque enters the battlefield, if {B} was spent to cast it, target player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov mage-sculptors bring their stone to life before they carve it. The shrieking begins as soon as the mouths are formed.

card.name: Sinstriker's Will
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target attacking or blocking creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Steel rusts. Arrows break. But righteousness is always strong, always sharp."

card.name: Skyrider Trainee
card.property: Skyrider Trainee has flying as long as it's enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course I plan on going up. Kang here is the most trusted 'fin on the squad. Afraid? Me? No, I'm just . . . waiting for the right wind conditions."

card.name: Spelltithe Enforcer
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player sacrifices a permanent unless they pay {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His assistants calculate the amount of the tribute. He measures out the punishment for delinquency.

card.name: Storm Herd
card.property: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd." —Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor

card.name: To Arms!
card.property: Untap all creatures you control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The call came, spell-borne through mortar and stone to the ear of every soldier. The call came, and the advantage was ours." —Lodusz, captain of the watch

card.name: Withstand
card.property: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defense is as much a part of war as offense, the shield as important a tool as the sword." —Alovnek, Boros guildmage

card.name: Aetherplasm
card.property: Whenever Aetherplasm blocks a creature, you may return Aetherplasm to its owner's hand. If you do, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield blocking that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fickle form holds hints of a thousand former identities.

card.name: Crystal Seer
card.property: When Crystal Seer enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order. {4}{U}: Return Crystal Seer to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Surprise is a useless, untidy emotion—the plaything of goblins and fools."

card.name: Drowned Rusalka
card.property: {U}, Sacrifice a creature: Discard a card, then draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lurking below the current, she thirsts until others come to drink.

card.name: Frazzle
card.property: Counter target nonblue spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chant was interrupted, the components cooked, and Zok worried that it was his brain he smelled smoking.

card.name: Gigadrowse
card.property: Replicate {U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Tap target permanent.

card.name: Hatching Plans
card.property: When Hatching Plans is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So wondrous to behold, so delicate and finely crafted—and yet, such a pleasure to smash.

card.name: Infiltrator's Magemark
card.property: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In secrecy is strength. None can oppose one who cannot be found." —Szadek

card.name: Leyline of Singularity
card.property: If Leyline of Singularity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. All nonland permanents are legendary.

card.name: Mimeofacture
card.property: Replicate {3}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Choose target permanent an opponent controls. Search that player's library for a card with the same name and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Quicken
card.property: The next sorcery card you cast this turn can be cast as though it had flash. (It can be cast any time you could cast an instant.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A skilled Izzet chronarch can carry out an epic vendetta between the fall of one hourglass grain and the next.

card.name: Repeal
card.property: Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be." —Agosto, Azorius imperator

card.name: Runeboggle
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ever try to count hyperactive schoolchildren while someone shouts random numbers in your ear? It's like that." —Geetra, frustrated mage

card.name: Sky Swallower
card.property: Flying When Sky Swallower enters the battlefield, target opponent gains control of all other permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Would you trade the world for such a pet?

card.name: Steamcore Weird
card.property: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

card.name: Stratozeppelid
card.property: Flying Stratozeppelid can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The "Days of Darkness" mark the stratozeppelids' annual migration, when for five days they blot out the sun and trumpet their passing.

card.name: Thunderheads
card.property: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clouds grew thick, and then they grew teeth.

card.name: Torch Drake
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Torch Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drakes? Bah! Things that breathe don't interest me. It breathes fire, you say? Well, that's a different story!" —Zataz, Izzet clockwork artificer

card.name: Train of Thought
card.property: Replicate {1}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But then . . . oh, but . . . which means . . . which would lead to . . . exactly!"

card.name: Vacuumelt
card.property: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vedalken Plotter
card.property: When Vedalken Plotter enters the battlefield, exchange control of target land you control and target land an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fair? At what point in our negotiations did you convince yourself my goal was to be fair?"

card.name: Vertigo Spawn
card.property: Defender Whenever Vertigo Spawn blocks a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Abyssal Nocturnus
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Abyssal Nocturnus gets +2/+2 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear to keep an open mind, for there are those who would use it as a door to my soul." —Voka Schlak, Mauzam Asylum inmate, diary

card.name: Caustic Rain
card.property: Exile target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looking out the great windows of Vitu-Ghazi at the foundry stacks belching their smoke to the sky, I wonder when the sky will take its vengeance." —Heruj, Selesnya initiate

card.name: Cremate
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cremation of the dead is not a religious ritual in Ravnica. It's a business designed to keep the Golgari from growing in numbers.

card.name: Cry of Contrition
card.property: Target player discards a card. Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.) When the creature Cry of Contrition haunts dies, target player discards a card.

card.name: Cryptwailing
card.property: {1}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Piece the tragic notes together and is it not a melody?" —Teysa

card.name: Daggerclaw Imp
card.property: Flying Daggerclaw Imp can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

card.name: Douse in Gloom
card.property: Douse in Gloom deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov prisoners are steeped in a blackened brew that robs their souls of strength. Patriarchs drink that brew to extend their own lives.

card.name: Exhumer Thrull
card.property: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Exhumer Thrull enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Hissing Miasma
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks you, its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All that remains when the fog finishes are neat piles of polished bones, like acid-etched glass. Orzhov servants collect them to make altar chimes.

card.name: Leyline of the Void
card.property: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Necromancer's Magemark
card.property: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1. If a creature you control that's enchanted would die, return it to its owner's hand instead.

card.name: Orzhov Euthanist
card.property: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Orzhov Euthanist enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Ostiary Thrull
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov churches don't pass the plate for collection. They charge for admission.

card.name: Plagued Rusalka
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies." —Savra

card.name: Poisonbelly Ogre
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some claim it's a failed Simic experiment, others say a Golgari creation. Both guilds deny all responsibility, while secretly studying its strange virulence.

card.name: Restless Bones

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We mourn our dead. We shroud our dead. We bury our dead. Too often, it seems, we must kill our dead again." —Grazda, veteran armorer

card.name: Revenant Patriarch
card.property: When Revenant Patriarch enters the battlefield, if {W} was spent to cast it, target player skips their next combat phase. Revenant Patriarch can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Golgari raise the bodies of their dead to serve. We raise the spirits of our dead to lead."

card.name: Sanguine Praetor
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy each creature with the same converted mana cost as the sacrificed creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our fealty to guilds dooms us. The old gods shall resurface. Our skins will wave upon the guild-masts over emptied streets, and our bones will clatter in the wind." —Ilromov, traveling storyteller

card.name: Seize the Soul
card.property: Destroy target nonwhite, nonblack creature. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Haunt (When this spell card is put into a graveyard after resolving, exile it haunting target creature.) When the creature Seize the Soul haunts dies, destroy target nonwhite, nonblack creature. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Skeletal Vampire
card.property: Flying When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying. Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.

card.name: Smogsteed Rider
card.property: Whenever Smogsteed Rider attacks, each other attacking creature gains fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An entire order of mages who draw their power from Ravnica's smog? Yet another indicator of our world's decay." —Dravash, dowsing shaman

card.name: Bloodscale Prowler
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It tracks its victims by the scent of their breath, preferring to dine on those who recently ate well.

card.name: Fencer's Magemark
card.property: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first blow is the most important. It often negates the need for a second." —Agrus Kos

card.name: Ghor-Clan Bloodscale
card.property: First strike {3}{G}: Ghor-Clan Bloodscale gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At mealtimes, the Gruul customarily omit such niceties as using forks or killing the entrée.

card.name: Hypervolt Grasp
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target." {1}{U}: Return Hypervolt Grasp to its owner's hand.

card.name: Leyline of Lightning
card.property: If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Living Inferno
card.property: {T}: Living Inferno deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Living Inferno.

card.name: Ogre Savant
card.property: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast it, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Parallectric Feedback
card.property: Parallectric Feedback deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't have so many people living so close together, all practicing so much magic, and not expect some feedback."

card.name: Pyromatics
card.property: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Rabble-Rouser
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) {R}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Rabble-Rouser's power.

card.name: Scorched Rusalka
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

card.name: Shattering Spree
card.property: Replicate {R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Siege of Towers
card.property: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Target Mountain becomes a 3/1 creature. It's still a land.

card.name: Skarrgan Firebird
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Tin Street Hooligan
card.property: When Tin Street Hooligan enters the battlefield, if {G} was spent to cast it, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rauck-Chauv's like a holiday! Only it isn't on the calendars, and instead of dancing you knock people flat, and instead of giving gifts you break stuff."

card.name: Battering Wurm
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Creatures with power less than Battering Wurm's power can't block it.

card.name: Beastmaster's Magemark
card.property: Enchant creature Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1. Whenever a creature you control that's enchanted becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Bioplasm
card.property: Whenever Bioplasm attacks, exile the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, Bioplasm gets +X/+Y until end of turn, where X is the exiled creature card's power and Y is its toughness.

card.name: Crash Landing
card.property: Target creature with flying loses flying until end of turn. Crash Landing deals damage to that creature equal to the number of Forests you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The other guilds think they're untouchable. It's time we brought them back down to earth." —Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

card.name: Dryad Sophisticate
card.property: Nonbasic landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Tin Street to the Outcast Mansions, she walks unbidden and unbound, her graceful silence never shaken by the riot of city life around her.

card.name: Earth Surge
card.property: Each land gets +2/+2 as long as it's a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some gardeners sing to plants. I tell them stories—stories of how they once ruled the world, of the mortals who destroyed their kind, and of revenge." —Bougrat, druid of the Cult of Yore

card.name: Gatherer of Graces
card.property: Gatherer of Graces gets +1/+1 for each Aura attached to it. Sacrifice an Aura: Regenerate Gatherer of Graces.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Garb is for common folk. I prefer to wear insight and zeal, ambition and flame."

card.name: Ghor-Clan Savage
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The snap of sinew. The crunch of bone. A cry for mercy. These are the music of the Gruul.

card.name: Gristleback
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Sacrifice Gristleback: You gain life equal to Gristleback's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loyal in battle, hearty in stew.

card.name: Gruul Nodorog
card.property: {R}: Gruul Nodorog gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Petting the nodorog —Gruul expression meaning "making a really big mistake"

card.name: Gruul Scrapper
card.property: When Gruul Scrapper enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast it, it gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul aren't satisfied with just smashing things. They continue smashing other things with the things they just smashed.

card.name: Leyline of Lifeforce
card.property: If Leyline of Lifeforce is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Creature spells can't be countered.

card.name: Petrified Wood-Kin
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Bloodthirst X (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn.) Protection from instants

card.name: Predatory Focus
card.property: You may have creatures you control assign their combat damage this turn as though they weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instinct blood-tinted his world until he could see only one thing clearly: his prey.

card.name: Primeval Light
card.property: Destroy all enchantments target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look to the old tomes, those bound in hides and written in yarberry ink. They hold the spells that can free us of the clutter of modern magecraft." —Dravash, dowsing shaman

card.name: Silhana Ledgewalker
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Silhana Ledgewalker can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Street folk call them "spire mice," but behind the mockery is an unspoken envy of the ledgewalkers' skill at avoiding harm.

card.name: Silhana Starfletcher
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As Silhana Starfletcher enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In light he finds both gift and weapon.

card.name: Skarrgan Pit-Skulk
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Creatures with power less than Skarrgan Pit-Skulk's power can't block it.

card.name: Starved Rusalka
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No more wretched fate is there than to waste away. If you are slain, your ghost may at least avenge itself upon your killer. But what release is there for one slain by Time?" —Ilromov, traveling storyteller

card.name: Wildsize
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two times the size, four times the smell.

card.name: Wurmweaver Coil
card.property: Enchant green creature Enchanted creature gets +6/+6. {G}{G}{G}, Sacrifice Wurmweaver Coil: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some use magic to spy through walls. Others use it to crush them.

card.name: Agent of Masks
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say that I am two-faced? Enough with the flattery. We have business to conduct."

card.name: Angel of Despair
card.property: Flying When Angel of Despair enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void." —Razia

card.name: Blind Hunter
card.property: Flying Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Blind Hunter enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Borborygmos
card.property: Trample Whenever Borborygmos deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy to see why those Gruul dirtbags follow him—the only orders he gives are 'Crush them!' and 'We eat!'" —Teysa

card.name: Burning-Tree Bloodscale
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) {2}{R}: Target creature can't block Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn. {2}{G}: Target creature blocks Burning-Tree Bloodscale this turn if able.

card.name: Burning-Tree Shaman
card.property: Whenever a player activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Burning-Tree Shaman deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul shamans are bent on punishing the civilized. Any act more complex than rubbing sticks together or eating with utensils is met with the stinging burn of their magic.

card.name: Castigate
card.property: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have no need for military might. We wield two of the sharpest swords ever forged: Faith in our left hand, Wealth in our right." —Vuliev of the Ghost Council

card.name: Cerebral Vortex
card.property: Target player draws two cards, then Cerebral Vortex deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards they've drawn this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Izzet brains and Izzet boilers: contents under pressure.

card.name: Conjurer's Ban
card.property: Choose a card name. Until your next turn, spells with the chosen name can't be cast and lands with the chosen name can't be played. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov faithful file past to have their minds purged of "impure" desires. There, the guiltwardens eliminate any thoughts of hope or self-sufficiency.

card.name: Culling Sun
card.property: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who truly runs this city? Look to the sky on hallowed days, and see whose sigil is stamped clearly onto the heavens." —Vuliev of the Ghost Council

card.name: Dune-Brood Nephilim
card.property: Whenever Dune-Brood Nephilim deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 colorless Sand creature token for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, it spawned nameless thousands to herald its arrival.

card.name: Electrolyze
card.property: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet learn something from every lesson they teach.

card.name: Feral Animist
card.property: {3}: Feral Animist gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He chanted over a pot of boiling blood and honey. His brain buzzed like a nest of hornets, and his muscles rippled with the might of the bear.

card.name: Gelectrode
card.property: {T}: Gelectrode deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap Gelectrode.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Diametrically opposing energies in self-sealed plasmodermic bubbles make great pets!" —Trivaz, Izzet mage

card.name: Ghost Council of Orzhova
card.property: When Ghost Council of Orzhova enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile Ghost Council of Orzhova. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Glint-Eye Nephilim
card.property: Whenever Glint-Eye Nephilim deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards. {1}, Discard a card: Glint-Eye Nephilim gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, it shook the plane with the thunder of its craving.

card.name: Goblin Flectomancer
card.property: Sacrifice Goblin Flectomancer: You may change the targets of target instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rerouting magic through a goblin's brain is the surest way to throw it wildly off course.

card.name: Ink-Treader Nephilim
card.property: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, if that spell targets only Ink-Treader Nephilim, copy the spell for each other creature that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, the mirrors of the world reflected only darkness.

card.name: Invoke the Firemind
card.property: Choose one — • Draw X cards. • Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

card.name: Izzet Chronarch
card.property: When Izzet Chronarch enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He ensures not only whether but also when and where the lightning strikes twice.

card.name: Killer Instinct
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take the bridge, men! Victory! Victory is ou— Retreat! RETREAT!"

card.name: Leap of Flame
card.property: Replicate {U}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Mortify
card.property: Destroy target creature or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The eyes let flow with tears, then blood, then the very soul—the whole wrung inside out, dripping down into the blackened puddle of the past.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Orzhov Pontiff
card.property: Haunt (When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.) When Orzhov Pontiff enters the battlefield or the creature it haunts dies, choose one — • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. • Creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Which is worse—the sleep which never ends or that which never comes?

card.name: Rumbling Slum
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Rumbling Slum deals 1 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov contract the Izzet to animate slum districts and banish them to the wastes. The Gruul adopt them and send them back to the city for vengeance.

card.name: Savage Twister
card.property: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example." —Trigori, Azorius senator

card.name: Scab-Clan Mauler
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They inflict pain to forget their own and break foes to feel whole.

card.name: Schismotivate
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I ran the experiment through the brain of a schizophrenic lab-goblin. My burners' flames fell asleep while the beakers jumped about and shattered. Success!" —Myznar, Izzet psychomancer

card.name: Skarrgan Skybreaker
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) {1}, Sacrifice Skarrgan Skybreaker: It deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky isn't falling—it's being thrown at us!" —Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

card.name: Souls of the Faultless
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Souls of the Faultless is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life and attacking player loses that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More horrible than their empty forms are their noble eyes. I dare not strike." —Klattic, Boros legionnaire

card.name: Stitch in Time
card.property: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quyzl was told by his mentor to "make more time" for his studies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov run a construction unit whose only business is rebuilding the wreckage left in the wake of wurms. When business is slow, they pay Golgari carnomancers to lure the wurms to the surface.

card.name: Teysa, Orzhov Scion
card.property: Sacrifice three white creatures: Exile target creature. Whenever another black creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Tibor and Lumia
card.property: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a red spell, Tibor and Lumia deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tracing the horizon in a dance of wind and fire.

card.name: Ulasht, the Hate Seed
card.property: Ulasht, the Hate Seed enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other red creature you control and a +1/+1 counter on it for each other green creature you control. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ulasht: Choose one — • Ulasht deals 1 damage to target creature. • Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Wee Dragonauts
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Wee Dragonauts gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blazekite is a simple concept, really—just a vehicular application of dragscoop ionics and electropropulsion magnetronics." —Juzba, Izzet tinker

card.name: Witch-Maw Nephilim
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, you may put two +1/+1 counters on Witch-Maw Nephilim. Whenever Witch-Maw Nephilim attacks, it gains trample until end of turn if its power is 10 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, it shattered the hillsides to make way for its passage.

card.name: Wreak Havoc
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target artifact or land.

card.name: Yore-Tiller Nephilim
card.property: Whenever Yore-Tiller Nephilim attacks, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it awoke, the worms of the earth hissed in a chorus of beckoning.

card.name: Debtors' Knell
card.property: ({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One moment, conscious only of a sense of repose. The next moment, hearing the trudge of his own footsteps. He sighed and squinted into the glare ahead.

card.name: Djinn Illuminatus
card.property: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Giant Solifuge
card.property: ({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.) Trample; haste; shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We respect all lifeforms, but this one we respect from a distance." —Mandor, Selesnya ranger

card.name: Gruul Guildmage
card.property: ({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.) {3}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Gruul Guildmage deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. {3}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Izzet Guildmage
card.property: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) {2}{U}: Copy target instant spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy. {2}{R}: Copy target sorcery spell you control with converted mana cost 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Mourning Thrull
card.property: ({W/B} can be paid with either {W} or {B}.) Flying Whenever Mourning Thrull deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During their ascent to spirithood, patriarchs of Orzhova shed both flesh and emotion. This earthly slag is collected and formed into thrulls.

card.name: Orzhov Guildmage
Petrahydrox
card.property: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) When Petrahydrox becomes the target of a spell or ability, return Petrahydrox to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It departs through the streets' fissures with a sound like gravel pouring into a pond.

card.name: Wild Cantor
card.property: ({R/G} can be paid with either {R} or {G}.) Sacrifice Wild Cantor: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are the voice of the wild, crying out with nature's fury and bringing forth its primeval might.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

card.name: Gruul War Plow
card.property: Creatures you control have trample. {1}{R}{G}: Gruul War Plow becomes a 4/4 Juggernaut artifact creature until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Steering apparatus?! What for? Rip it out, sharpen it, and lash it to the front!" —Ktank, Gruul plowmaster

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

card.name: Mizzium Transreliquat
card.property: {3}: Mizzium Transreliquat becomes a copy of target artifact until end of turn. {1}{U}{R}: Mizzium Transreliquat becomes a copy of target artifact, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is it? Um . . . what do you want it to be?" —Juzba, Izzet tinker

card.name: Moratorium Stone
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {2}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Moratorium Stone: Exile target nonland card from a graveyard, all other cards from graveyards with the same name as that card, and all permanents with that name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

card.name: Sword of the Paruns
card.property: As long as equipped creature is tapped, tapped creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as equipped creature is untapped, untapped creatures you control get +0/+2. {3}: You may tap or untap equipped creature. Equip {3}

card.name: Godless Shrine
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Gruul Turf
card.property: Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped. When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

card.name: Izzet Boilerworks
card.property: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Nivix, Aerie of the Firemind
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{U}{R}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until your next turn, you may cast it if it's an instant or sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Niv-Mizzet's genius and vanity reverberate throughout the mirrored halls of Nivix.

card.name: Orzhov Basilica
card.property: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

card.name: Orzhova, the Church of Deals
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{W}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike most churches, at Orzhova it's best to pray before you arrive.

card.name: Skarrg, the Rage Pits
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This palace will be our fire-spit, and roasted prince our victory meal. Send in the torch-pigs!" —Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

card.name: Steam Vents
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} or {R}.) As Steam Vents enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Stomping Ground
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
